extendedInfo.description: If you are Jason Mraz's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check Jason Mraz's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all Jason Mraz's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of Jason Mraz's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)-------------------------------- Main Features -------------------------------- - Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics-------------------------------- List of albums -------------------------------- - Waiting for My Rocket to Come- Tonight, Not Again: Jason Mraz Live at the Eagles Ballroom- Mr. AâZ- We Sing, We Dance, We Steal Things- Love Is a Four Letter Word-------------------------------- List of lyrics -------------------------------- - (This Movie Is) Rated Ours- 0% Interest- 10,000 Motherfuckers- 1000 Things- 5/6- 93 Million Miles- A Beautiful Mess- Absolutely Zero- After An Afternoon- Be Honest- Bella Luna- Better- Boy's Gone- Bright Eyes- Burning Bridges- Butterfly- Childlike Wildlife- Clockwatching- Collapsible Plans- Common Pleasure- Coyotes- Curbside Prophet- Dead End- Details In The Fabric- Did You Get My Message?- Dream Life Of Rand McNally- Everything Is Sound (La La La)- Forecast- Frank D Fixer- Freedom Song- Galaxy- Geek In The Pink- Gypsy MC- Halfway Around The World- I Melt With You- I Never Knew You- I Won't Give Up- I Won't Give Up (Demo Version)- If It Kills Me- I'll Do Anything- I'm Coming Over- I'm Yours- I'm Yours (Acoustic Version)- In Your Hands- Life Is Wonderful- Live High- Living In The Moment- Love For A Child- Love Is Real- Lucky- Make It Mine- Mr. Curiosity- Mudhouse / Gypsy MC- No Doubling Back- No Stopping Us- Not So Usual- O. Lover- On Love, In Sadness- Only Human- Out Of Your Hands- Plain Jane- Plane- Please Don't Tell Her- Prettiest Friend- Remedy (I Won't Worry)- Rescue- Rocket Man- Sail Away- San Disco Reggaefornia- She Is The Bomb- Silent Love Song- Sleep All Day- Sleeping To Dream- Song For A Friend- Summer Breeze- The Beauty In Ugly- The Boy's Gone- The Darkest Space- The Dynamo Of Volition- The Freedom Song- The Woman I Love- The World As I See It- Thinkin' About You- This Is What Our Love Looks Like- Tonight, Not Again- Too Much Food- Unfold- Unravel- Up- What Mama Say- What Would Love Do- When We Die- Who I Am Today- Who Needs Shelter- Who's Thinking About You Now?- Wordplay- You And I Both- You Fuckin' Did It- You Make Me High (Spinning)
